amendment.description: An amendment numbered 17 printed in Part D of House Report 118-216 to reduce funds apportioned to USAID by $4.5 billion and transfers to the Spending Reduction Account.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the U.S. Agency for International Development by $4.5 billion and apply the savings to the Spending Reduction Account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gaetz amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 115 - 312 (Roll no. 466).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Gaetz amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 115 - 312 (Roll no. 466).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
